© 2026 The Bearded Ax 1077 E. Montague Ave. North Charleston, SC (843) 377-8884

Where Awesomeness Lives

More than your typical Ax throwing venue, we have a golf simulator, retro video games embedded in the bar top, pool/billiards, foosball, pinball, skeeball, Karaoke every Friday night, live music, and an extensive drink menu including many non-alcoholic options. From first dates to large corporate parties, we have you covered. Our Ax targets are the best in the state and our coaches will have you hitting bullseyes in no time!

Charleston's only 5.0✪ Google rating entertainment venue!
Book Now 
Our Hours

Monday – Wednesday 4pm – 9pm

Thursday 12pm – 9pm

Friday – Saturday 12pm – 12am

Sunday 12pm – 9pm
